root.name: GuitarFreaks
root.description: GuitarFreaks is a rhythm game based on a guitar, originally released in arcades by Konami in 1998 before being ported to the PlayStation. You could play up to one to five songs with a single session of gameplay, but also get extra songs by achieving a great score within the game.The gameplay is simple as the corresponding buttons would appear on the screen from left to right, and the user must hit the buttons at the correct time. Scoring is based on how closely the player's performance and timing matches the original song.
